name: Viromo
overview:
Viromo is transforming the way home builders sell homes. Viromo specializes in taking the standard 2D Blueprints and making them come to life with our patented technology by creating 3D interactive home models. From there, the sky is the limit as we are fully customizable and accessible over multiple platforms.

What this means for Home Builders

• Their customers do not need to “imagine” what there prospective house could look like • They can educate and sell their passive customer easier and from the comfort of their own home • Get rid of the typical floor plan that does not give their designs justice • They can provide an experience that is forward thinking and engaging • Help their staff sell better with virtual walkthroughs and customizable options to provide the best service possible • Upgrades, custom options can be viewed and assessed by both sales people and customers • Viromo will provide them with more traffic to their sales rooms and websites

Viromo’s product will increase your website and salesroom traffic, customer knowledge and overall brand reputation as one of the most forward thinking and value added home builders in the market today. Viromo’s motto is if it exists we can create it and our profile proves this. Viromo has completed several projects for Homes by Avi including 3D interactive home models in their show homes, multiple virtual videos and their flagship project, The Calgary Stampede Rotary Dream Home. Visit our website to learn more at www.viromo.com
